body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, soldier. Resident of Johnson County in 1850. Resident of Johnson County in 1860. Served in the Sandy Valley Battalion of the 1st Regiment Capital Guards (U.S.A.) as sergeant from June 9, 1864 to March 11, 1865.
